name: Kino
description:
Searching for a planet for your robot comrades, you come across a challenge- the last form of organic life. It's up to you to get down to the root of things....

WASD and Arrows to move (And control Prompts). Spacebar to attack (And to accept prompts/Advance dialogue).

CREDITS:
